name: Central Hub
description: The main city in the game world where players can trade, rest, and get quests.

name: Ancient Monument
description: A mysterious stone structure with strange glyphs carved into its surface.

name: Observation Tower
description: A tall tower offering a panoramic view of the surrounding landscape.

name: Crystal Deposit
description: A valuable resource node containing energy crystals.

name: Mineral Vein
description: Rich deposits of rare metals and minerals.

name: Merchant Outpost
description: A small trading post where travelers can exchange goods.

name: Artisan Workshop
description: A craftsman's workshop specializing in unique items.

name: Monster Den
description: A cave inhabited by dangerous creatures. Approach with caution!

name: Corrupted Zone
description: An area tainted by strange energies. Not safe for unprepared explorers.

name: Distress Signal
description: Someone is calling for help from this location.

name: Lost Expedition
description: The last known location of a missing research team.
